distributeReward(address,uint256,bytes32.details: This will be called by Foundry's invariant fuzzer

invariant_ContractBalanceNonNegative().details: This ensures the contract doesn't go into negative balance

invariant_RewardsNeverExceedInput().details: This ensures no tokens are created out of thin air

invariant_TokenConservation().details: For any distribution, sum of all recipient balances increase = totalAmount (or less due to rounding)

distributeReward(address,uint256,bytes32.notice: Helper function to distribute rewards (called by fuzzer via targetContract)

invariant_ContractBalanceNonNegative().notice: Invariant: Contract token balance is always sufficient for pending distributions

invariant_DecayConfigValid().notice: Invariant: Decay configuration values are within valid bounds

invariant_NoDoubleDistribution().notice: Invariant: Each reward can only be distributed once

invariant_OracleAuthorizationConsistent(.notice: Invariant: Oracle authorization state is consistent

invariant_OriginalUserPercentageRespecte.notice: Invariant: Original user percentage is always respected

invariant_RewardsNeverExceedInput().notice: Invariant: Total rewards distributed never exceed total input amounts

invariant_TokenConservation().notice: Invariant: Reward distribution preserves token conservation
